name: MPContentItem
desc: An object containing the information for a displayed media item.

items.name: init(identifier: String)
items.desc: Sets the identifier for a media item.

items.name: var artwork: MPMediaItemArtwork?
items.desc: A single image that is associated with the media item.

items.name: var isContainer: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a media item is container of other items.

items.name: var isExplicitContent: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the media item contains explicit content.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The unique identifier for the media item.

items.name: var isPlayable: Bool
items.desc: Determines if a media item is able to be played.

items.name: var isStreamingContent: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the content item is streaming content.

items.name: var playbackProgress: Float
items.desc: The amount of content that has been played for the media item.

items.name: var subtitle: String?
items.desc: A secondary designator for the media item.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The public name of the media item.
